question: Which one of the following is not correctly matched?
option1: Isopleth — A line joining places of equal height
option2: Isobar — A line joining places of equal pressure
option3: Isohyet — A line joining places of equal rainfall
option4: Isotherm — A line joining places of equal temperature
answer: Isopleth — A line joining places of equal height
explanation: Isopleth is a line on a map connecting points having equal incidence of a specified meteorological feature.
